parameters: I've got somethin' special for you, today, Pumpkin.
Ta-da! The Autumn Special, made extra special just for your
birthday. I used a brand new recipe this time, so it's even
Aw, thanks Pops. It's really nice. I mean it.
Did I do something wrong? Should I have gone with the old
recipe then? Jeez, I'm sorry, Autumn.
No, no, it's not you, Pops. This is amazing. It smells
wonderful. I just, y'know, got my expectations up.
Oh, you were thinking about going outside the village then,
You know that's what I always ask for.
Listen, as much as I hate it, I can't-
-let me go out. It's okay, I know that. You don't have to
I just figured that maybe today would be different.
With each passing day, you remind me more and more of your
She was a spirited woman too. Always wanted me to take her
This ribbon in my hands was the only thing that I managed
to keep from her before she left us.
I've kept it around to remind myself of her, but I want you
to take it now. As a sign of your growth.
Wow, that's a lot to handle.
Go ahead, Pumpkin. I didn't bake it for nothin'.
I'll let you have TWO big servings, but no more than that,
Augustus! Come quick! We have a problem!
I see you ended up taking a little more, then.
Well... You did end up taking a lot of extra time... and I
So, what now? We got anything else planned for tonight?
Oh, no. It's getting late. I'll be around, reading a bit
into the night. You should get some sleep for tomorrow.
Well, I am really tired after eating that cake. I'm
surprised how filling it ended up being!
Yeah, yeah. I laced it with cinder bricks.
Oh wow, nice one, Pops. You'd better hope I don't break the
bed when I jump into it.
If that bed breaks, you're the one fixing it.
Now, let go!! You're gonna choke me!
Ugh, morning Pops... Got anything to eat yet? I'm
I guess he's out getting something.

parameters.name: Elysium in the Blue Sky (Xenoblade Chronicles 2)

parameters: I don't know what to write in this letter. There are a lot
of things that I could say, but I figure that it's best to
get straight to the point instead of trying to reinforce
this with any amount of apologies and attempts to cushion
I'm not here, and it's likely that I'm probably not going
to be around anymore. There's unfinished business that I
have to attend to, and it needs to be done in order for
You're at an age where I trust you to be independent and
resourceful, but don't forget the people that you have
around you. The villagers will be happy to help if you need
However, if you feel like you need to leave, I can't stop
you anymore. I have faith in you to remain safe. However,
if you were you to take only one piece of advice from
Do not come after me. I'll be fine.
He's telling me to just let him go, like that?
Th-There's no way he'd write something like this. There's
But, why would they want to kidnap Pops?
UGH! All this brain wracking's not gonna get me anywhere.
I gotta ask around to see if the villagers know.
...He didn't even make anything to eat...All I've got is
Alright, Pops. Don't worry. I'm gonna find you.
She's enjoying her two slices of cake. If you get too close,
she attempts to hide it from you.
(Pops suspects she has had more than he allowed her to.)
An envelop with a message inside it for someone.
A handmade doll. It was a gift to Autumn from one of the
Somebody made it with their hands.
